content: pusheen amigurumi main body work in a continuous spiral magic_ring 6 single_crochet into circle increase x 6 12 single_crochet *single_crochet increase* x 6 18 single_crochet *2 single_crochet increase* x 6 24 single_crochet *3 single_crochet increase* x 6 30 single_crochet *4 single_crochet increase* x 6 36 single_crochet *5 single_crochet increase* x 6 42 single_crochet *6 single_crochet increase* x 6 48 single_crochet single_crochet around x 21 row add safety eyes between row 10 & 11 and 17 & 18 add stuffing until you get the shape materials you like adding extra stuffing as you work decrease row 3 5mm hook dk yarn in light grey and dark grey *6 single_crochet sctog* x 6 42 single_crochet safety eyes *5 single_crochet sctog* x 6 36 single_crochet dark grey thread *4 single_crochet sctog* x 6 30 single_crochet yarn needle and thread needle *3 single_crochet sctog* x 6 24 single_crochet soft toy stuffing *2 single_crochet sctog* x 6 18 single_crochet *1 single_crochet sctog* x 6 12 single_crochet terms used sctog x 6 6 single_crochet this pattern uses us crochet terms finish off thread yarn through remaining stitches and pull tight chain chain st stitch ears x 2 slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet magic_ring increase increase work 2 single_crochet into st 3 single_crochet into ring sctog single_crochet together increase each st 6 single_crochet *single_crochet increase* x 3 9 single_crochet insert hook into front loop of next *2 single_crochet increase* x 3 12 single_crochet two stitches yarn over and pull through yarn over and pull through fasten_off and sew onto head above 2 loops on hook eyes inv invisible join back stripes x 2 finishing off chain 9 embroider details on face - head skip first chain and then 7 single_crochet across chain stripes whiskers & mouth to help 3 single_crochet in final chain get the shaping on pusheen s mouth 6 single_crochet in remaining back loops of chain 3 i couched the yarn with a single single_crochet in final loop strand of grey thread inv join to first st worked fasten_off and sew onto back tail work in the round joining each row with a slip_stitch - start with dark grey - magic_ring 5 single_crochet into ring increase x 5 10 single_crochet work 3 more row - change to light grey - work 3 row - change to dark grey - ta da now you just need to find work 3 row someone to give him a cuddle - - change to light grey - work 3 row please do not - change to dark grey - reproduce this work 3 row pattern stuff tail anywhere else - change to light grey - work 1 row sctog x 5 if you would like to let other 5 single_crochet around people know about it then please link to slip_stitch join to first single_crochet worked then finish off http //www loopyjess co uk/ 2021/08/pusheen-pattern html
